column1: I'm just thinking that whether we like it or not, another variable has been added to our travel concerns. Just thought we could create a helpful advice list for those worried about this virus -whether catching it or being quarantined. So here's a few pieces I've read so far. Please add if you think of anything.If you are taking life sustaining meds, bring 3 weeks extra (minimum)If you are young and healthy no big worries-but if you are possibly exposed, you could be a carrier-stay away from those more at risk for 14 days after your return.If elderly or if you have a chronic disease, know what areas and resorts have reported cases.Wipe the seat, seatbelt, food tray on the planeWash hands often.Don't let the media create hysteria-know the facts
